title: Ryze Rework Idea

embed.description: "Ryze" redirects here. For the Riot Games CEO, see Ryze (person). Ryze - the Rogue Mage 450/ 260

body:
Passive: Runic Shield

Gains Magic resist .5 per 50 mana
Gains Decaying shield after activating arcane mastery

Q:same

W: Same

E: Same:

R: Clones ryze abilities doing reduce damage, but enchancing the effects


feedback!
